page.title: 18DITTON PRIORS INDUSTRY.
page.content: {J.P.WOODS TURKEY FARM, LARCHWOOD FARM. J.P. Woods has 3 employees.When they have a new delivery they have got{56 {thousand turkeys.}After 6 months 36 thousand turkeys go to a factory in Craven Arms. The farm has 4 buildings with 14 thousand turkeys in each.They are fed automatically by hoppers.{ {WEST MIDLAND TIMBER TREATMENT COMPANY {FOREST BRANCH FENCING,LARCHWOOD. { }They get their wood from the Boyne Estate.They have 8 employees.They make farm fencing & posts for the U.K. {E.T. ROWLANDS LTD, MIDDLETON PRIORS. { }E.T. Rowlands have 6 lorries & 7 male workers, they transport all over the U.K.They started in 1929 and is still going strongly.They carry H.G.V. things like wood,concrete and metal. {DIESEL SERVICES, STATION ROAD.} Established in 1964, it has 8 workers who repair diesels for U.K.& Singapore
